thread.title: LIAT sends condolences to DominicaTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: LIAT sends condolences to DominicaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
LIAT sends condolences to Dominica Published on : Saturday, August 29, 2015
The Board of Directors, Management and Staff of LIAT (1974) Ltd have heard with great regret the news of the loss of life, devastation, and human suffering caused by torrential rain in Dominica as a result of Tropical Storm Erika.
“It was with a deep sense of sadness that all of us at LIAT learnt of the devastation and tragedy caused by this natural disaster,” Chief Executive Officer David Evans said in a message to Prime Minister Roosevelt Skerrit and the people of Dominica.
“As you deal with this tragedy, please be assured that all those who were affected are in our thoughts,” Mr. Evans said.
Source:- LIAT Airlines
